attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the prime minister is not very skilled in musical activities, so I propose that he should start recieving piano lessons up to at least an intermediate level. i feel that this will provide much needed relaxation for the prime minister and members of parliament. I think that, as a pianist myself, a piano would be an excellent use of taxpayers money.

rejection.details: Your petition should make a point about government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
